lead_paragraph: First, Kevin Love signaled that the Indiana Pacers should've been called for an eight-second violation in the backcourt.

headline.print_headline: Love Helps Refs, Cavs Beat Pacers, End Losing Streak
headline.main: Love Helps Refs, Cavs Beat Pacers, End Losing Streak
